scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Chris
scrape.text: Halfway through and I'm done with this shit.I wish I had gone with my gut and stopped back on page 57 after reading this:...it would have been a waste of all the time she invested to stop now--the way you don't put aside a bad book when you're halfway through it. You finish it reluctantly--that's the way she'd stayed with Serge. Perhaps the ending would make up for some of it.Perhaps it would, but I doubt it, Herman. I often put aside bad books when I'm halfway through with them. You finish it reluctantly? Not unless you're a masochist. Fuck bad books. Fuck 'em real good. I just wiped my ass with the last page of this book.
